document.full_text: passengers and crew on board a chicago-bound flight on sunday had to subdue a man who tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air, forcing the plane to make an unscheduled landing in st. louis, authorities said.
document.title: passenger tries to open door mid-air on continental flight
lines_and_colors: passengers and crew on board a chicago-bound flight on sunday had to subdue a man who tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air, forcing the plane to make an unscheduled landing in st. louis, authorities said.
